title: 'Pam & Tommy,' Episodes 1-3
description:
Bill Simmons and Chuck Klosterman talk about their mixed feelings about 'Pam & Tommy,' the new Hulu miniseries that tells the story of Pamela Anderson and Tommy Lee's leaked sex tape.

Hosts: Bill Simmons and Chuck Klosterman
Producer: Kaya McMullen
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
